fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Give someone a can of food.
- Give someone an empty can. 1 use.
- Open someone's can for them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first and second ability are indistinguishable to a target.
- A player with a closed can may choose to spend their night opening it themself.
- Your third ability is a day ability, but it takes effect at the end of the night, and you cannot give anyone a can of food that night. Your target will know you are opening their can for them.
- A player with an opened can may choose to consume it at any time, irrespective of whether or not they use their ability.  A can of food will heal them, an empty can will poison them unknowingly and not heal them.
- A player may have multiple cans.
- You may only give yourself one can, ever. It will automatically be open.
